text: Over the weekend, Jonathan Rhys Meyers'wife Mara Lane shared the heartbreaking news that the couple recently suffered a miscarriage with their second child. And on Tuesday night, the American actress took to Instagram to thank fans for the outpouring of support she and her husband have received in the ensuing days, while also revealing that their baby, Willow, has been laid to rest under their tree. She also took the brave move to share a brief clip of the devastating moment she was informed that her baby had no heartbeat, as she and her husband sought to be'transparent'through her journey of grief and help'others as well as ourselves '.
